resources.string: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
Surfing is like the mafia, once you’re in you’re in. There’s no getting out.
Love the life you live, live the life you love.
Success is going from failure to failure without a loss of enthusiasm.
Everything will be okay at the end. If it is not okay, it is not the end.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying.
Life is a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
If people had more sense of humor, we would live in a very different world.
Everything should be made as simple as possible. Not simpler.
Have more than you show, speak less than you know.
